page.title: 13THE GARAGE,TREVERVA
page.content: The garage owner that we interviewed owned a garage called Mill Garage. The garage carries out repairs on cars,motorbikes,pushbikes,washing machines et cetera.Mainly they repair the vehicles belonging to the local people. There are only two people employed and they work from 9am. to 6pm.His trade varies quite a lot with the tourist season. Up until three years ago they sold petrol and diesel which was delivered from Falmouth.He stopped selling petrol and diesel because the law said that his tanks were too near to the road.So now the owner concentrates on repairs.
